overview.business_description: German automotive and industrial supplier. Products include rolling bearings, linear guides, and automotive components. Recently acquired Vitesco Technologies (powertrain) in 2024.
business_positives: Technology leader in bearings and precision
overview.fatal_flaw: High leverage post-Vitesco acquisition; European auto exposure; integration execution risk
overview.recent_news: Completed Vitesco Technologies acquisition. Focused on deleveraging post-merger integration.

credit_opinion.summary: Schaeffler's credit profile is evolving post-Vitesco acquisition. The combined company has broader EV exposure but elevated leverage. Execution on integration and synergies is critical.
key_risks: ICE to EV transition managing decline
